title: Love the client

embed.description: Skip to the end. I got a leavebuster just after. For quite literally no reason. This was loading on a 120gb Kingston SSD by the way..

body:
This is a video I just recorded and uploaded today.

Now I know my PC is having some.... issues.. But for the last week or 2 I've been able to play League relatively fine without this happening. Sure I've had a few bugsplats, but nothing like this.

What's more is I got a leaverbuster right after.

Assuming the link I've provided works as intended, it should be skipped right to the part I finally got in.

10/10 would waste other peoples time again...
